job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As a front-end engineer in the team, you'll be focusing on exposing the functionality built by the rest of the team towards our customers. The functionality you'll be building will introduce state-of-the-art concepts around a revolutionary technology. Making the concept of generative AI accessible, reliable, and customizable around the domain of a specific business will be the major focus. Exploring new techniques and interfaces to ensure customer adoption and value. A few key aspects were looking for in you as a front-end engineer are:

   The concept of Generative AI, as well as the products you'll be building are considered state-of-the-art. You'll be working closely with product management, data scientists, and back-end engineers in a highly dynamic environment constantly looking to deliver new functionality to increase customer adoption and product market fit.
job_details.full_text:
Front End Developer

As a front-end engineer in the team, you'll be focusing on exposing the functionality built by the rest of the team towards our customers. The functionality you'll be building will introduce state-of-the-art concepts around a revolutionary technology. Making the concept of generative AI accessible, reliable, and customizable around the domain of a specific business will be the major focus. Exploring new techniques and interfaces to ensure customer adoption and value. A few key aspects were looking for in you as a front-end engineer are:

   The concept of Generative AI, as well as the products you'll be building are considered state-of-the-art. You'll be working closely with product management, data scientists, and back-end engineers in a highly dynamic environment constantly looking to deliver new functionality to increase customer adoption and product market fit.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on front-end development and exposing functionality to customers, rather than the core development, fine-tuning, or deployment of generative AI models. While it mentions 'generative AI' and 'state-of-the-art concepts', the primary responsibilities and skills described align with traditional front-end engineering, making it fall under the 'Ambiguous' category as it's not a core AI engineering role.

job_tasks.justification: The description explicitly states the role focuses on 'exposing the functionality built by the rest of the team towards our customers' and 'building will introduce state-of-the-art concepts'. This points to developing user-facing applications and integrating features.
job_tasks.phrase: exposing the functionality built by the rest of the team towards our customers

job_tasks.justification: The role involves making 'generative AI accessible, reliable, and customizable', which implies building interfaces and applications around AI capabilities.
job_tasks.phrase: Making the concept of generative AI accessible, reliable, and customizable

job_tasks.justification: The role involves working closely with product management to 'increase customer adoption and product market fit', indicating a need to understand business goals and market needs.
job_tasks.phrase: increase customer adoption and product market fit

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions working 'closely with product management, data scientists, and back-end engineers', highlighting the need for collaboration.
job_tasks.phrase: working closely with product management, data scientists, and back-end engineers

soft_skills.phrase: working closely with product management, data scientists, and back-end engineers
constantly looking to deliver new functionality
